findings.title: Discrepancy in comment about upgrade action
findings.description: The upgrade action to set the sequencer inbox maximum time variation contains an incorrect comment.

findings.title: Unresolved 'TODO' comments in NomineeGovernorV2UpgradeActionTemplate
findings.description: The `NomineeGovernorV2` upgrade action contains unresolved “TODO” comments that need to be addressed before a final deployment and upgrade are possible.

findings.title: Unnecessary duplication in inheritance
findings.description: The `governance` codebase contains several instances of duplicate inheritance—a child contract inherits from a contract already in the inheritance tree of its parent.
